title: The Peanut Butter Wars: A Homemaker Changes How Food is Regulated in America
itunes:title: The Peanut Butter Wars: A Homemaker Changes How Food is Regulated in America
itunes:subtitle: Filipino delicacies found at a bus station in Tel Aviv; Marketplace's Krissy Clark reports on the peanut butter controversy that changed how the FDA regulates commercial foods; and how to revive stale spices.
description:
Filipino delicacies found at a bus station in Tel Aviv; Marketplace’s Krissy Clark reports on the peanut butter controversy that changed how the FDA regulates commercial foods; and how to revive stale spices.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
